Fruta: Building a Feature-Rich App with.title: Fruta: Building a Feature-Rich App with SwiftUI

abstract.text: Create a shared codebase to build a multiplatform app that offers widgets and an App Clip.
Create widgets to show your app’s content on the Home screen, with custom intents for user-customizable settings.

Building Widgets Using WidgetKit and Swi.title: Building Widgets Using WidgetKit and SwiftUI

abstract.text: Create a custom view with data driven transitions and animations in SwiftUI.

Restoring Your App’s State with SwiftUI.title: Restoring Your App’s State with SwiftUI

abstract.text: Provide app continuity for users by preserving their current activities.
SwiftUI is a modern way to declare user interfaces for any Apple platform. Create beautiful, dynamic apps faster than ever before.
